name: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 1 - Fright of the Bumblebees
name_original: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 1 - Fright of the Bumblebees
description:
Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 1 - Fright of the Bumblebees is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2009. Telltale Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures Episode 1 - Fright of the Bumblebees on iOS, PC and Xbox 360.
